column4: so if i have karmic installed, then i should just make an .iso image of 11.10 (somehow), and install that also (or delete karmic in the process)?
why would somebody want to use older versions of ubuntu?
i.e. using LTS to have updates etc.
but what is good about updates?
so if somebody is not interested in security issues, then updates don't matter?
so would anybody care to help me get my karmic koala working?... or point me in the right direction?
oh... is there a channel that it's supported in? or do i have to support myself with it? lol
i don't need it, but i waz using it and would like to make it work... no strong reason
